issue.title: What version of srcsim is cloudsim running?

content.raw:
CloudSim is running SRCSim from debs, so it's currently using the latest available release (0.5.0).

The 0.6.0 release containing the changes you mention is currently in the oven. As soon as that's released, we'll start porting CloudSim to use that. Teams will be notified via email.
